price: 45. Allah le[461] protégea donc du mal de leurs intrigues, et le plus dur des supplices cerna de toutes parts le peuple de Pharaon.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
footnotes: [461] Il protégea le croyant de la famille de Pharaon mentionné au verset 28 et suivants.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhu al-lahu sayyiāti mā makarū waḥāqa biāli fir'ʿawna sūu al-ʿadhābi
